column3: Director – Levant & Pakistan Account Manager Lead
column7:
Company Description

Common Purpose, Uncommon Opportunity. Everyone at Visa works with one goal in mind – making sure that Visa is the best way to pay and be paid, for everyone everywhere. This is our global vision and the common purpose that unites the entire Visa team. As a global payments technology company, tech is at the heart of what we do: Our VisaNet network processes over 13,000 transactions per second for people and businesses around the world, enabling them to use digital currency instead of cash and checks. We are also global advocates for financial inclusion, working with partners around the world to help those who lack access to financial services join the global economy. Visa's sponsorships, including the Olympics and FIFA™ World Cup, celebrate teamwork, diversity, and excellence throughout the world. If you have a passion to make a difference in the lives of people around the world, Visa offers an uncommon opportunity to build a strong, thriving career. Visa is fueled by our team of talented employees who continuously raise the bar on delivering the convenience and security of digital currency to people all over the world. Join our team and find out how Visa is everywhere you want to be.

Job Description

Job Scope

This is a people manager role responsible for leading a department of Account Managers team who responsible for overall operational support, proactive service improvement and operational relationship for all Levant & Pakistan Clients and Processors, and enhancing the quality of client’s experiences in all their interactions with Client Support and Implementations (CSI).

Principle Responsibilities/Key Results Area
Provides functional and technical leadership for all operational activities for Clients, orchestrating cross functional delivery of systems and services to Clients; deploys client support strategies that preserve Visa and client expertise while delivering effective, efficient and consultative support and project management that aligns to Visa and Client business goals and objectives.Provide leadership, strategic direction and management for a team of individual contributors, establishing a customer focused, performance based cultureDevelop, coach and mentor staff to maximize employee performance; complete employee performance reviews and salary evaluationsServe as an internal and external senior escalation contactEnsure the team is broadly engaged with all internal stakeholder organizations including CSS, Sales, Product, Systems, Risk and Legal.Lead process efficiency efforts by aiding staff to identify and implement departmental process improvements through analysis of support trends by country, client, product, service, processing questions and issues; support internal and external recovery efforts of product and/or processing service interruptionsWith a view to enhancing Client Experience, advocate on behalf of all Levant & Pakistan clients to internal stakeholder organizations including CSI, Sales, Product, Systems, Risk and Legal, to expedite the resolution and implementation of solutions in order to achieve the highest possible degree of client satisfactionConsidered the functional expert for processing and operational business, providing operational and product based expertise and guidance with a view to client operational readiness and effective implementationRole requires significant interaction and subject matter expertise in a number of broad areas with unique requirements across the globe (e.g. Market & Client business drivers, Product variations, BER support practices, Tools, Training etc.)Work closely with Market Readiness and Project Implementation teams to understand goals and be able to support organizational objectivesMaintain and build rapport with Regional peers and other Client Support teams across Visa Inc. to exchange, learn and leverage best practicesDrives problem and communication management for any critical issue affecting Client, or Client issue affecting Visa. Due to size and diversity of clients, issues are complex and cross multiple parts of the Visa and Client organization. Significant cardholder and merchant service degradation can be experiencedStay current with industry and client trends and maintain a strong knowledge of Visa products and VisaNet services.

Accountability & Scope
Accountable for Client satisfactionKey contributor to ensure that the Global/Regional Client Support strategy is delivered to Levant & Pakistan Clients.Review, implement and maintain quality control processes to:Understand, evaluate, and execute procedures properly and investigate any deviations from the processMaintain documentation and control proceduresSupervise account support services lines and processesMonitor performance and prepare statistical reportsDetermine relevant quality associated training needs and coach staff as needed Analyze performance data against defined key performance indicatorsQualifications
Key Competencies 
Strong client, processor, and end-user focus – client drivenStrong collaboration and teamworkExcellent analytical and numerical skillsStrong leadership/managerial skillsAble to select, develop, support and retain a diverse and high performing staffExcellent English written and verbal communication requiredStrong presentation skills

Financial & Organizational Scope
Accountability for team budget but not responsible for the management of a cost centre

Professional

Required Experience (education, skills - professional/technical/business)
Bachelors/Degree or equivalent work experience. Typically requires a minimum of 8-12 years progressively responsible experience in customer service and technical support role in the financial or information technology industry, with management experience preferred.

Technical
Working knowledge of Visa systems including authorization and clearing systems, client connectivity, Visa Settlement ServiceWorking knowledge of Client business drivers for their operations and processing businessesDemonstrated, detailed knowledge of the full breadth of systems, products and services offered by Visa

Business
Ability to lead and drive team to achieve and exceed established goals and objectivesCustomer serviceDemonstrated ability to work in a complex organization to determine business and customer needs, providing the best solution to meet those needs.Self motivated with the ability to work under pressure with a diplomatic approach and customer service focus, while possessing a collaborative team work spiritFluency in English languages is necessary.Candidate must have the ability to travel.Additional Information
Job Number: REF11544N
column9: Consumer Services, Financial Services, Information Technology & Services
column12: Visa Inc. (NYSE: V) is the world’s leader in digital payments. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, reliable and secure payment network - enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive. Our advanced global processing network, VisaNet, provides secure and reliable payments around the world, and is capable of handling more than 65,000 transaction messages a second. The company’s relentless focus on innovation is a catalyst for the rapid growth of connected commerce on any device, and a driving force behind the dream of a cashless future for everyone, everywhere. As the world moves from analog to digital, Visa is applying our brand, products, people, network and scale to reshape the future of commerce. For more information, visit visa.com/about, visacorporate.tumblr.com and @VisaNews on Twitter.

Ionic 2/3,Cordova,Angular2, Typescript.. Firebase Itunes Connect, Google Play Console Xcode, Android Studio Git,Svn REST apis

• Write Technical Analysis.

• Proficiency in Relational Oracle Databases

• Good Analytical Thinking Skills
column12:
Capital Banking Solutions is a leading provider of end-to-end, integrated banking software for businesses across Europe, Africa, the Middle East and the Americas. The company offers a suite of integrated and modular products for retail, corporate and private banks, as well as financial institutions. 

Offering flexible delivery models, from on-premise installations to managed hosting to banking in the cloud, our flagship product, CapitalBanker, provides a core banking platform with a robust set of capabilities to support the business functions for commercial banks. 

The company also provides a full portfolio of extensible software modules that integrate with CapitalBanker to bolster key functions such as business intelligence, risk management and compliance, bank office automation, and multi-channel support including internet and mobile banking.

Ranked amongst the top vendors by major industry analysts, Capital Banking Solutions has attained double digit growth helping over 250 customers worldwide, including Bank Audi, Bank of Africa, Banco Sabadell, Credit Suisse, Rothschild, Iraqi Middle East Investment Bank, Al-Khaliji Bank, and Aruba Bank to manage all of their front office and back office IT needs, expand to new markets and meet local compliance and regulations. 

For further information, please do not hesitate to contact us at sales@capital-banking.com 

For career opportunities, please send your CV to hr@capital-banking.com 

New York•Miami•Paris•Monaco•Geneva•Dubai•Beirut•Abidjan

column7:
We are a group of Technology companies and are looking to hire 2 hybrid app developers with 3 - 5 years of experience in building Challenging Mobile / Tablet Apps using hybrid frameworks. Candidates need to be motivated and work as part of a team while meeting deadlines. 
English Communication Skills is a Must  

You will be working on challenging projects in a performance driven and passionate environment and part of a group that is growing exponentially across the region. Our focus is solely on building and expanding our SAAS Product Offering through disruptive next level enterprise solutions from Video Streaming moving into healthcare , hospitality, retail, and insurance. 
Candidates need to have the below skills: - Native / Hybrid App Development for iOS and Android - Cordova , Angular, Node, React, Xamarin, etc...  - Experience in Mobile Performance, Caching, etc... - Big Data Platforms (Hadoop, Cassandra dB, Elastic Search, Rabbit MQ) is a plus - Experience with highscalability environments is also a plus (150K rpm and above) - Experience in Video Streaming and Wowza Media Server is a Plus 


Job Location: Jounieh, Lebanon  Schedule: Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm

We are looking for a PHP Developer to join our team of Web Development working on Corporate Software Solution development in Infosysta entity in Beirut and collaborating with Infosysta teams located in Cairo, Riyadh & Dubai.
    The Candidate will 
  ·       Develop New Features, Enhancements and Bugs fixing in PHP and related technologies
 ·       Translate Business needs into Technical Specifications
·       Adopt to Agile Workflow (working on Jira, Bitbucket Git, Kanban & Scrum)  ·       Develp connectors and Web Services through APIs.
 ·       Think out-of-the-box and suggest improvements to the software to keep it free of bugs.  ·       Optimize the Performance of the application to keep it fast for the end-user  ·       Enhance the UI/UX of the Web Application to keep it friendly.  ·       Provide 2nd Level Support to Business Teams  ·       Participate in the Release Management and all IT & Infrastructure tasks related to the deployment of Software releases.  ·       Help junior developers and colleagues when relevant  ·       Work hand-by-hand with the head of R&D and Team Lead located in Beirut to deliver excellent quality of code.  ·       Handle the Unit Testing of own development to deliver stable releases
    Desired Skills & Experience 
  ·       Bachelor of Engineering or Computer Science  ·       2 to 5 years years relevant experience in PHP coding and team leadership, with an excellent knowledge of its ecosystems  ·       Excellent experience in Code Igniter and Laravel is a must  ·       Proficient with Object Oriented and Design Patterns  ·       Relevant experience in JavaScript (jQuery), HTML, CSS, SQL  ·       Advanced skills in MSSQL, MySQL and Oracle Databases  ·       Excellent experience in Web Services integration (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML)  ·       Excellent Code structure & organization methodology  ·       Excellent Troubleshooting skills  ·       Working on Git as Code Source Management is a big plus  ·       Understanding of SDLC & ALM is a big plus  ·       Hard worker with high flexibility in daily work  ·       Good communication skills in English  ·       Customer oriented with Team work attitude
 ·       Flexible to adapt quickly to changes in an Agile Environment  ·       Motivated to join a dynamic team     Employment Type: Full-time  Salary: based on profile  Location : Infosysta, Saeb Salam Avenue, Beirut, Lebanon  Work days: 5 days per week, Monday to Friday
 
About Infosysta 
  Infosysta is a multi-national Software Integrator & Software Provider active in EMEA with offices in Dubai, Beirut & Cairo and acting though active partnership in Riyadh, Paris & London. Its mission is to provide companies with advanced consultancy, development and implementation expertise in various business solutions such as Agile Project Management, Application Lifecycle Management (ALM), IT Service Management & Service Desk (ITSM), Demand Management, Task Management System, Content & Document Management, Legal Practice Management, Tracking Systems, Workflow & Collaboration Solutions and much more. 
 Infosysta is an authorized Solution Partner of Atlassian offering integration services of leading applications such JIRA Software, Jira Service Desk, Confluence, Bamboo, Bitbucket, HipChat and more. As an Atlassian Expert, Infosysta Experts provide consultancy, business process engineering, implementation, integration, customization, change management, training and support services. 
 Infosysta is also a provider of best-of-breed solutions like App4Legal, the Legal Practice Management Solution, and App4Daycare the solution for daycares management, and App4Clinic, the ultimate solution for clinics and multi-clinic. Website www.infosysta.com
column12:
INFOSYSTA is a Software Development and Consultancy Firm. Its mission is to provide companies with advanced development and consultancy expertise in various business solutions such as Agile methodologies, ALM, Service Desk, Demand Management, Task Management System, Content & Document Management, Agile Project Management, Legal Practice Management, Tracking Systems, Workflow & Collaboration Solutions and much more. 

INFOSYSTA Experts put the world of software at your fingertips. Infosysta offers expert consultancy, fully customized solutions, integration, support and training services. Infosysta is also certified partner of Atlassian in EMEA offering integration services of leading applications such JIRA, Confluence, Bamboo, Bitbucket, Fisheye, HipChat and related products.

As a certified Atlassian Expert, INFOSYSTA provides consultancy, business process engineering, implementation, integration, customization, change management, training and support.

INFOSYSTA is also a provide of App4Legal, the Legal Practice Management Solution, and App4Daycare the solution for daycares management, and App4Clinic, the ultimate solution for clinics and multi-clinics.

column7:
Responsibilities: 
 Monitor and analyze local and international media (conventional, unconventional) related to economic, social, and business / industry development to ensure up-to-date intelligence and insights on market drivers and performance   Engage with the “Project Manager” of each project during project design, development and execution phases to provide timely needed data, insights and analysis in coherence with department standards. 

Draft contextual information materials, such as questionnaire, datasheets, background notes, economic and political profiles of relevance to projects in hand; Manage data and insights to ensure its accessibility by other team members (when/if needed) and utility.    Produce accurate and timely analysis, reports, video scripts, infographic content, papers, newsletters, and other types of deliverables that support the on-going projects handled by the department   Attend meetings with management as required, but not limited to, subject specific projects with clients 

Research and gather a wide range of data, insights for Multiply Research & Consultancy website, social media platforms, and company profile.

Develop and edit materials, including writing short articles, blog’s content and video clips to be published on the company website, Social media as well as printed materials including profile 
Develop tenders, proposals for different tenders and research related projects and pitches covering economic / social analysis, business consultancies, data mining, and other possible deliverables   Participate in the development and implementation in conjunction with management, growth strategy of Multiply Research & Consultancy and provide actionable business intelligence when needed.   Ensure all research standards and best practices are applied throughout the course of all research projects, as per procedures and practices implemented in the department   Participate actively in the development and execution of Multiply Research & Consultancy business development strategy and plan     Qualification: Master degree in Economics, International Trade 
Work Experience 5- 6 years directly related working experience High exposure to quantitative and qualitative research studies, interfacing with clients to proactively deliver on agreed KPIs 
Knowledge and Skills: Good knowledge of market research techniques, approaches and methodologies Evolving knowledge of UAE/ region market dynamics and key industries drivers Good understanding of Economic metrics and fundamentals Good understanding of geo-economics drivers and analysis Good command in speaking, reading and writing of English and Arabic languages Advanced computer skills with Microsoft Office (especially Access & Excel), PASW (SPSS) statistical software, social media platforms, and general Internet and electronic communications. High personal motivation, self-management and detail-orientation Ability to take responsibility in meeting deadlines and making progress with & without direct supervision
column12:
We are positively contagious, and have the power to influence people and change human behavior.

Multiply Marketing Consultancy is a dynamic, motivated, professional, friendly and full-service marketing consultancy. We are more than just a standard marketing consultancy. We are a full-service consultancy that provides marketing strategies and planning, market research and studies, public relations, branding and creative services and out-of-home media. 

This gives us a definitive edge over our competitors as our complementary services are developed to work hand in hand and to offer a holistic approach to our clients.

Multiply Marketing Consultancy is about adding value to the process of marketing rather than simply doing as we are asked. We take the whole process of marketing and other services off our clients’ desks onto ours, and then plan and deliver what is needed efficiently, effectively and at the best cost.

We are are member of DMA, MEPRA, Marketing Society and ESOMAR

To view our Corporate Video please visit: https://vimeo.com/113596262

Position: Business Development Officer Education: BS Pharmacy Years of Experience: 1-2 (experience in Community Pharmacy is accepted)  Contract Length: 3 years 
Brief Description on Duties: Identify new opportunities to explore Evaluate and classify companies approached as per standard criteria Track and execute opportunities under consideration File Company approached, and all actions performed on a regular basis Draft Confidential Agreements in conjunction with suppliers while collaborating with appointed lawyer Request from regulatory department a sheet briefing in market registered/under registration competitors for market size identification and business case preparation Communicate to current suppliers on yearly basis to request the updated products list for review and assessment Review the list of participants in international conferences and arrange for meetings with potential companies in coordination with the Business Development Coordinator   Skills Required: Communication Skills Organizational Skills Time Management Analytical Skills

Job Description:  The Supply Chain Management Trainee program is designed for young graduated talents who are looking to develop a set of specialized skills in the Supply Chain Management to take on a management role within 18 to 24 months of joining the program. Management Trainee will be given three rotational assignments that are 6 months based in various areas.  This is primarily a transitional training position, under the direct management and supervision of the Supply Chain Manager.  This program has three two objectives:  The first focuses on the technical aspects of producing the beer while optimizing the plant’s performance with a special focus on preventive maintenance. Assignments will cover the following areas: brewing, fermentation, packaging, bottling, maintaining quality of beer and machines.  The second objective focuses on leadership. As part of this experience, Management Trainee will be subject to Training & Development program that focuses on Personal Effectiveness, Interpersonal Skills & Working together, Change Management and the role of a manager.  Our Management Trainee:  Experiences a high structured training that includes both formal and on-the-job programs. Partners with a mentor at Almaza to help him/her navigate the program. Receives compensation packages and full employee benefits.   Job Requirements  Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Mechanical, Electrical or equivalent) Fresh graduate or up to Two years of experience  Must demonstrate leadership style and analytical skills. Should also have a structured work approach Should be a native Arabic speaker and fluent in written and spoken English Should be computer proficient Demonstrated past success in extra curriculum activities or previous job. Is ambitious and has an aspiration to grow with Heineken
column12:
Proud member of the Heineken Group having high quality of earnings, strong portfolio of value brands, offering the best service to our clients and therefore delivering stable profit growth. 

Working for a beer company like Brasserie Almaza certainly has its diamond glitter! 
We are a group of 220 highly talented people sharing depth knowledge in the field and meeting international standards. Our Company consists of five departments full of passion, energy and creativity: HR, Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain and Finance collaborating together in synergy to provide best moments to our customers & consumers. 


Why Join Almaza?

Being part of Brasserie Almaza gives you the opportunity to carry our Lebanese legacy and be part of Heineken the huge multinational company. You get to work with high standards and to exchange business insights with professional colleagues each in his field of expertise. We encourage personal growth by setting continuous development plans, ambitious business objectives and assigning new and motivational projects. We empower our employees to take initiative and challenge the status quo to lead the company in today’s fast-changing competitive environment. Besides working in a fun environment, we often celebrate occasions together and hold gatherings of all sorts to share our passion for beer.

column3: Head of Alumni and Career Office
column7: Main Responsibility: improving the foundations of the Alumni Office, development objectives, especially as needed to ensure proper cultivation of major gifts prospects. Education: Bachelor's degree in Business or related fields /Master’s degree is a plus. Work Experience: 5-7 years of doing the above-mentioned tasks.   Skills and knowledge: Profession in English language - Time management – Communication – Leadership- Strong computer Skills and Social media.   Main duties:  Alumni and Career Office: Create and implement a plan for alumni relations in support of the University’s Strategic Plan and Mission Statement. Work with other members of the office in creating and implementing the Alumni Relations Plan. Organize and execute regional, cultivation, stewardship and networking events as necessary and provide follow-up reporting. Complete necessary metric reports for the President. Create and introduce student engagement plans to connect current students to the global alumni network of professionals and educate them about their lifelong role as BAU alumni. Schedule, plan and coordinate an annual calendar of alumni events for all campuses. Provide leadership and direction to the university concerning the collection, distribution and integrity of alumni data. Define the key metrics for alumni engagement, oversee the collection of and analysis of data, evaluate program success, and employ data - based decision making to strengthen the University’s Alumni Relations efforts. Outreach and Communications: Reviews regularly the alumni section of the University’s website and provides content for the maintenance of this website to assure accuracy and timeliness of information.
column12: About BAU: Beirut Arab University (BAU) is one of the leading universities in Lebanon and the Middle East. Our institution, faculties, and programs are accredited from renowned international accreditation bodies. Our students and staff come from different backgrounds and more than 57 countries and nationalities, which makes BAU a diverse environment for students and staff. BAU is devoted to achieve excellence in teaching, research, and services to the community. With 46 undergraduate programs and 164 graduate programs, Beirut Arab University embraces several academic disciplines including human sciences, law and political science, business administration, architecture, engineering, sciences, pharmacy, dentistry, and health sciences. Visit our website at www.bau.edu.lb to find out more about what BAU offers its students and staff. If you are interested in recruiting BAU students or alumni, kindly contact the Alumni Office on the details found at this page http://www.bau.edu.lb/Alumni.

Established in Hong Kong in 2000, Pacific Strategies & Assessments (PSA) provides specialist risk consulting services, delivering critical information to our clients through our three core service lines of Ethics & Compliance, Investigations & Disputes, and Advisory Services. 

Our offices in Dubai, Hong Kong, Manila, and Shanghai are each staffed with investigators and responders with extensive in-region experience gained from professional backgrounds in corporate investigations, government intelligence, management consulting, and law enforcement.

column7:
Role Location:  Beirut, Lebanon Role Title: Business Analyst - Team Lead Salary Range: $2,000 - $2,500 all inclusive (i.e. incl. basic salary and benefits) + social security 
 Company Overview
 
BLU Solutions, established in 2013, is a regional company with offices in both Dubai and Beirut. The focus of the company is in the areas of rewards / loyalty, CRM, direct marketing, business intelligence and customer analytics. The company has developed its own systems and solutions, which are offered to clients to help them leverage customer data and customer relationships via innovative loyalty programs. It has plans to expand aggressively, eventually becoming a global provider and a leader in the sector it is in.  
Opportunity  
 We are looking for a detail-oriented and driven Business Analyst. This role will be located in our Beirut office and will involve handling all business analysis-related responsibilities from managing the product development process, documenting the different processes and procedures to coordinating with project managers.     The primary responsibilities of the candidate are to review, analyze and evaluate business client and user need, document requirements and processes, define scope and objectives, , perform some user acceptance testing and formulate technical requirements to parallel overall business strategies.     The candidate will work alongside other business analysts and to succeed in this role he/she should have a natural analytical way of thinking and be able to explain difficult concepts to non-technical users.     This is a position in a fast growing company that provides the perfect environment for career growth and personal development.    
Job Functions Developing technical solutions to business problems by defining, analyzing and documenting requirements. Discussing and assessing requirements with external clients and/or internal stakeholders, translating them into technical specifications for development and ensuring that they are met. Working with other internal stakeholders to establish procedures, standards and systems in relation to products, enhancements, upgrades, etc. Write and prepare applications-related documentation including functionalities and system capabilities. Constructing workflow charts and diagrams; studying system capabilities; writing specifications Understanding and communicating the financial and operational impact of any changes Staying up-to-date on the latest process and IT advancements to automate and modernize the company’s applications and systems. Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings. Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports. Working closely with clients, developers, QAs and managerial staff. Performing user acceptance testing for specific cases to ensure final products meets requirements. Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users. Managing competing resources and priorities. Monitoring business analysis-deliverables and ensuring timely completion of requirements and their related projects.    Required Profile and Skills  
Bachelors Degree in MIS, Computer Science, Business Computing or similar engineering degree English/Arabic language proficiency, French preferable Work experience between 5-7 years in a similar capacity Positive attitude, detail and customer oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability General knowledge and understanding of technology and trends Proven working experience in business analysis within a technology organization Excellent analytical, writing, and communication skills Demonstrable knowledge and experience with BA-related tools, approaches, methodologies and skills

Details: Ideally you are someone with a development/engineering background with UX interest and looking to shift to Product Management. Anghami's product team is responsible for managing the conceptualization, design, development, and release of new features and products within our platform, ensuring that we deliver the best possible experience to our customers — while driving toward larger business goals. You should be able to anticipate, recognize, and push through resistance or setbacks, and to work with others to find common ground amongst conflicts. A product manager will go out of their way to solve a problem. Have an ability to be creative & inspire team members to be action-oriented and stretch their imagination. 
Must Have: Passionate about Anghami's mission to bring music to the region. An engineering/development background (2-4 years) to allow effective communication with engineers. Self learner (yet a team player - team player can be added to the resistance sentence to spice it up). Someone who believes projects are a living thing, by delivery and iterating to make it better.
Careful and flexible thought on prioritization, tradeoffs and the user experience. Is knowledgeable about mobile apps. Ability to develop metrics & attention to details. Experience working on data or analytics products is a plus. User Experience/Front-End work is a plus.
Project management skills are a plus however willingness to learn is a must.

Benefits: We offer an environment that encourages drive and motivation hence we guarantee training and development. If you are interested in joining a team of passionate, extremely talented industry veterans in the mobile space, who like to work hard and play hard, we look forward to hearing from you soon!
column12: Based in Lebanon, Anghami is the leading music service venture created by seasoned entrepreneurs, funded with over 30 million$ by leading firms in the Middle East, with the aim to change the way music is discovered and listened to. Anghami is listed as #2 startup in the Forbes top 100 Middle Eastern startups in 2017. Since its launch public launch in January 2012, Anghami has over 57 million users and growing throughout the Middle East and the world. We're bringing back cool into music by allowing you to listen to all the music you love, on any device - by redefining what’s possible in the Middle East, and evolving how music is consumed. We move quickly and carefully, and we want passionate people to be part of the journey. We’re looking for people willing to work hard and grow in a best of breed startup environment in a company that is undergoing tremendous success. We work to maintain a healthy balance of strong senior engineers and smart junior engineers eager to develop their skills. We believe Anghami is a place to come and deliver career-defining achievements.

We are looking for a dynamic person who loves research, reading, writing high quality and original content material on topics related to Human Resource.     Aqeed is an insurance technology company that aims to make insurance simple, transparent, and accessible.     Responsibilities: Full focus on HR topics in the Middle East specifically UAE and Saudi Arabia
Identify topics on HR to be researched
Collect data and information as requested, implement data collection and feed data into databases, managing databases, preparing materials (statistics, tables, charts, stats, power points) for topics to be written

Revise articles based on editorial feedback
Work with graphic designer, marketing and tech team to plan layout and visual and multimedia elements
Takes charge of assigned parts of one or more HR research topics by doing background research (literature review, analyze other data sets, etc.), interviewing people, companies or specialists to gather original data to be used in developing material for writing.
Responsible for developing original articles on HR for our blog
Develop quarterly literature review on an area of focus for Human Capital (examples: Strategic Workforce Planning, Employee Engagement, Leadership Development, Human Capital Analytics, etc.)
Demonstrates initiative beyond the successful completion of research support in order to foster collaboration, generate new ideas and processes.

Be involved in creating in implementing major surveys including assistance in the development of questionnaires, code, format, construction and verification of sampling plans, process responses, contact of survey participants, and other data collection activities.
Post and input Web-based surveys.
Develop and implement outreach for articles
Will occasionally write content for other sections of the website, as well as help other staff with copy writing duties.

 Required Software  Microsoft Office   
Work experience  Experience doing research and conducting interviews to form articles.
Experience writing, with demonstrated ability to write for the web. 
 Technical Competencies: 
 Showcased Portfolio of Website and App designs
Knowledge of principles of organization and human resources
Communicate effectively and write clear, concise articles
Conduct research, compile data, analyse findings and make effective recommendations
Strong organizational and project management skills
Detail-oriented
Outstanding writing and presentation skills
 
Academic Qualifications   Bachelor's degree in English, Communications, Journalism; will consider other degrees with direct writing experience.

We are a technology company focused on making insurance simple again. We designed our technological solutions to help consumers understand insurance, manage insurance and buy insurance, in an easy and transparent manner.

Our vision is to digitize the insurance journey for our customers in a simple and efficient manner. Simplicity is at the core of our vision. We want to revolutionize how customers perceive insurance. We want to help them understand what they are buying, help them close the gap between what they have and what they need, and bring everything related to their insurance needs into one organized and efficient place. We want to make everything available for them in one place and at a tap of a button.

column7: GENERAL PURPOSE The Technology Department of World Logistics Council is responsible for all aspects of design, development, implementation, enhancement and maintenance of the B2B Digital Economy Platform known as Multi-Dimensional Digital Economy Applications System (MDDEAS). This platform is currently being built and will be governed in collaboration and partnership with the top technology firms of the world selected through an equal opportunity process. The MDDEAS consists of (but not limited to) technology platforms for supporting global e-commerce, e-finance, e-insurance and e-logistics app services. We are currently looking for a strong technology leader who will be initially a member of both Service Strategy and Service Design Councils and brings an excellent combination of enterprise architecture, software development, and program management skills.   POSITION SUMMARY AND KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Director, Software Development & Architecture is a key leadership position within Technology Department and will report directly to the Vice President of Technology. This position will be initially based at the HQ in Dearborn Michigan USA and will have responsibility for complete Software Development Life Cycle processes of MDDEAS platform and its Enterprise Architecture Standards and Governance. The Service Strategy and Architecture, and Service Design Technology teams will report into this role. This position requires global travel. The travel may include to the regional council offices including MEA Regional Council, Beirut, Lebanon, or to the countries of clients and customer locations participating in the Benchmark Trade Lanes (BTLs) for MDDEAS deployment, or to the technology partner locations during the course of development, deployment and support operations of MDDEAS platform services. This role initially requires travel to and extended stays in Beirut, Lebanon for establishing initial architectural standards, proving out the technology concepts, building initial demo and Proof of Concept (POCs) products for MDDEAS.   QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE:   QUALIFICATIONS AND CERTIFICATIONS Master’s Degree in Technology, Information Systems, Engineering and/or Significant Industry Certifications and Recognition. An MBA is desirable. ITIL V3 Foundation Certification is required. Intermediate Certification in ITIL V3 Service Strategy and/or Service Design highly desirable. Project management certifications desired including PMP, PMI-ACP, CSM, or PSM.   ARCHITECTURE EXPERIENCE 12+ years of IT infrastructure architecture, design, operations, and quality improvement experience in all technology platforms required for hosting software applications globally. Experience in working with senior leadership teams both internally and externally. Knowledge and experience in enterprise architecture framework, such as, TOGAF, Zachman, FEAF, Gartner EA Framework, etc. Enterprise Information Architecture experience in Fortune 500 companies. Knowledge, experience and skills in cloud computing. Capture the tactical and strategic enterprise goals that provide traceability through the organization and are mapped to metrics that provide ongoing governance. Demonstrated experience in designing, implementing and improving business service capability and end-to-end processes. Experience leveraging industry standard methodologies in the areas of Business Architecture, Business Process Management, Continuous Improvement, Business Process Outsourcing and/or Change Management. Present and communicate complex problems and recommended solutions to diverse audiences and executives. Experience base-lining and quantifying current state business problems as well as constructing cost/benefit-based solution recommendations. Experience in architecting the WAN, Wireless WAN, LAN, and other connectivity solutions to support Smart Campuses.   SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT EXPERIENCE A strong track record of 12+ years in the development of new and innovative services, ideally in a start-up organization, with the ability to manage an element of risk and uncertainty. More than five years of business domain expertise in Logistics, Commerce (Marketing & Advertising), Finance, and Insurance industries. Needs be an expert in at least one of these industries with the ability to coordinate with the Business Architects in the remaining domains. A result-driven approach to service development and business planning, plus a creative and innovative approach to resolving challenges. Experience in prevalent web application development platforms including JAVA/JEE, Business Rules Engines, Content Management Systems, Business Process Management Systems, Personalization Engines, and Ontologies. Experience in developing Rich Internet Applications using HATEOS methodology preferred. The drive to lead in your area of responsibility, demonstrating strong program management skills and collaborative strategic working. Strong in developing Rich Internet Applications with expertise all tiers of applications development. Direct experience in architecting and building complex solutions based on Cloud technologies, including private, public, and hybrid cloud solutions. A high degree of familiarity with the latest Software Development methodologies using agile approaches such as RUP/XP/SCRUM and DevOps practices including Continuous Build Integration and Testing (CBIT). Expertise in establishing and maintaining Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity capabilities for large enterprises. Expertise in delivering Active-Active and High Availability solutions to mission critical applications. Familiarity or experience with leading technologies such as Blockchain, IoT, AI, information security and risk management standards and practices. Experience in business development, governance processes, management, budgeting and financial justification.   LEADERSHIP SKILLS Technology team management experience (multi-region, 100’s of staff). Builds strong trusting relationships both internally and externally. Energetic, forward-thinking and creative individual with high ethical standards and an appropriate professional image. Sharp analytical abilities and solid operational foundation. Articulate and confident; motivates people at all levels of a culturally diverse organization. Strong sense for setting priorities, and adjusting them as needed in order to accomplish all objectives in an effective and timely manner. Strategic thinker, demonstrating sound judgment and agile decision making. Committed to continually improve, and leverage quality systems, processes, and tools An adaptable and flexible working style suited to a fast-evolving environment, working as a team and individually to make the new service a success. Experience of developing and delivering digital tools and resources. Strong written and verbal communication, inter-personal and team collaboration skills. Ability to build and deliver complex keynote presentations, demos and messaging to an industry leading level. Proven ability to adapt to new technologies and quickly establish credibility across a large number of technologies and industries. Experienced technology challenger in complex scenario’s both internally and Externally. International travel flexibility, and minimal visa restrictions. Reports to Vice president of Technology
column12: ABOUT GCEL AND THE GLOBAL DIGITAL ECONOMY   Global Coalition for Efficient Logistics (GCEL; www.gcel.net ), a Swiss-based public/private partnership, is empowering the world with true Digital Economy through its Digital Economy Platform that provides e-Commerce, e-Finance, e-Insurance, and e-Logistics services free of cost all the organizations in the Business to Business marketplace.   GCEL is leading the deployment of its Digital Economy Platform through its coalition of more than 150 governments through their pan regional organizations, 26 NGOs/IGOs, 26 of the leading global technology firms, and some of the world's most prominent advertising, finance, and insurance firms that have a combined workforce of more than 2.7 million and collectively service 60% of the world's GDP.   By 2025, its global Digital Economy Platform will decrease trading costs by USD 1.3 trillion a year, increase trade by USD 1.2 trillion a year, and create over 100 million jobs, mostly in Small and Medium Enterprises throughout the world, to deliver sustainable economic growth to all.   GCEL and its affiliate, Middle East and Africa Logistics Council (MLC), are seeking to hire qualified, passionate, and experienced candidates to play a major role in our mission that is bringing innovation and transformational practices to world trade securing greater prosperity today and for generations to come.   MLC is offering a unique and attractive growth opportunity for experienced Web/Mobile Developers to lead a growing team of software engineers to achieve project functionality along with the best of execution.   Please respond by sending an email with CV and cover letter stating availability date and expected salary to: humanresources@gcel.net

We are seeking a motivated, outgoing, result-driven, and confident Freelance Outdoor Sales Representative to join our growing team and drive sales for our business. As a Freelance Outdoor Sales Representative, you will act as a liaison between our company and the customer in order to establish trust, increase knowledge, and drive more sales for our company.  You will be responsible for influencing existing and potential customers to buy our services.  You must be able to understand the customer’s requirements in a short time and present solutions that meet their needs. The ideal candidate will also be patient and cool-tempered to deal with aggressiveness and complaints.  The goal is to promote business growth by expanding the company’s customers. 
 Key Responsibilities  Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent sales service.
Achieve sales targets.
Schedule sales appointments with current and prospective customers.
Maintain in-depth knowledge about our services and educate customers about them.
Ask pertinent questions to understand the customer’s requirements.
Persuade the customer to buy our services by demonstrating how they meet their needs.
Deal carefully and professionally with complaints or doubts to safeguard and promote the company’s reputation.
Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales.
Keep records of useful information.
Generate and track new leads to continue expanding the reach of the business.
Identify ways to market our services to new consumers, including identifying new target markets.
Uphold relationships with clients to ensure they remain satisfied, that their questions are answered, and that their needs are professionally met.
Collaborate with other sales and telemarketing consultants to discuss innovative ways to effectively sell to customers.
Build and promote strong, long-lasting relationships with customers.
Assess customer needs and requirements and suggest new ideas/strategies to generate interest in sales.
Assist the Sales Manager in the development and implementation of strategic and short-term plans for sales and telemarketing, which expand the company’s customer base and ensure its strong presence.
Constantly seek new ways to make services more attractive to current and prospective customers.
Use client feedback to improve customer experience.
Demonstrate advanced sales knowledge, and stay up to date on all company policies and procedures.
Any other responsibilities and duties related to this role as may be determined by the Sales Manager.
 
 Education  University degree in Marketing, Public Relations, or another related field.
A specialized certificate or training in Sales is advantageous.

Experience
At least 3 years of solid and relevant sales experience in a mid to large company.
Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quotas.
 
Skills  Professional and positive attitude.
Integrity and great work ethics.
Passion for relationship building and selling.
Confident, friendly, persuasive, and outgoing personality.
Customer service-oriented attitude.
Strong presentation and negotiation skills.
Ability to effectively communicate with customers and colleagues.
Resilient, persistent, patient, and able to handle customer rejection.
Excellent organization and time management capabilities.
Thrive as an individual and as part of a team.
Skilled in negotiation and dealing with complaints.
Persistent and results-oriented.
Attention to details.
Proficient in Microsoft Office, especially Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint.
Fluent in Arabic and English. French is advantageous.
column12:
Olbi is the new comprehensive source of information for businesses, professionals, and consumers. Olbi stands for “On-Line Business Information” and aims to connect buyers and sellers by providing complete, accurate, credible, and up-to-date information about all companies, businesses and professionals in Lebanon. On olbi.com you can find specific information about any business and professional such as their contact information, address, location on the map, products and services, job vacancies, offers, deals, promotions, etc. On olbi.com you can also find relevant economical and commercial news that is useful for businesses, professionals, and consumers.

Olbi connects Lebanese businesses with consumers who can directly and instantly take advantage of deals and offers and apply for open jobs. Olbi offers a variety of services and features to help businesses and professionals prosper and reach the consumers and meet their increasing demands for best services and products at convenient prices and with a simple click or tap on their phones, tablets, or computers.

In summary, olbi.com is your superior source of business and commercial information, where you can swiftly find exactly what you need and connect with businesses or professionals in Lebanon to take advantage of their best promotions and deals and learn about their services, products, and open jobs.

column7:
Bluering is seeking a telented Senior UX\UI Designer to join our Products & Technology Department. The Senior UX\UI Designer is responsible for designing state of art, user centered and innovative user experiences for Bluering Software Applications.  
WE'LL TRUST YOU TO:  Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mockups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences. Facilitate the products vision by researching, conceiving, sketching, prototyping and user-testing experiences for digital products. Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces. Identify design problems and devise elegant solutions. Make strategic design and user-experience decisions related to core, and new, functions and features. Take a user-centered design approach and rapidly test and iterate your designs. Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders. Ask smart questions, take risks and champion new ideas. 
WHAT YOU BRING WITH YOU: Three or more years of UX\UI design experience. Expertise in standard UX\UI software such as Sketch, OmniGraffle, Axure, InVision, UXPin, Balsamiq, Framer. Ability to work with internal/external clients to understand detailed requirements and design complete user experiences that meet their needs and vision. A solid grasp of user-centered design (UCD), planning and conducting user research, user testing, A/B testing, rapid prototyping, heuristic analysis, usability and accessibility concerns. Ability to iterate designs and solutions efficiently and intelligently. Passionate about resolving user pain points through great design.

  The Project Director is responsible for managing a multimillion USD T24/TCB implementation project(s). The role is the escalation point for all project issues outside the remit of the Project Manager, or requires other areas of the company to resolve i.e. resources/financial development. In addition the Project Director will serve on the project steering committee. The Project Director represents TEMENOS at the Clients’ Steering Committee Meetings and participates in all decisions related to priorities, budgets and any other event affecting the rollout of the project.  The Project Director is the next escalation step in the resolution of conflicts that may potentially arise between the client and the project team. 
  Responsibilities and Accountabilities     ·       Provides support to the Project Managers to ensure the coordination of the delivery of the different phases of the project.  ·       Ensures that TEMENOS quality methods and standards are applied and maintained in project implementations.  ·       Prepare, agree and obtain sign-off on a project definition.  ·       Acquire the resources required from TEMENOS, the client, or the external supplier to successfully complete the project(s).  ·       Guide and direct the Project Managers  ·       Monitor project progress against plan and address any project shortfalls.  ·       Escalate unresolved issues within TEMENOS to a point where they are satisfactorily resolved.  ·       Coordinate project related activities between various TEMENOS departments and the Client.  ·       Liaise with TEMENOS Senior Management on project/client issues to ensure a satisfactory conclusion.  ·       Supply TEMENOS Senior Management with Forecasts/Budgets within agreed timeframe.  ·       Act as line manager to Project Managers/project team members.  ·       Participates in presales/sales activities to understand and agree feasibility of contractual undertakings prior to signing of contract.  ·       Perform such other duties, functions and services, consistent with status or vocational ability, as may from time to time be required.        Certifications     TEMENOS certifications: minimum PMI certification or TEMENOS Project Management certification     The Project Director is required by TEMENOS to be certified with minimum PMI certification or TEMENOS Project Management certification or acquire TEMENOS certification within a defined timeframe (to be agreed with manager). 
   Skills and Qualifications     ·       Educational & Proficiency level: Minimum of 15 years of demonstrable experience in information systems project management, within a core a banking environment. T24 project experience is a must.  ·       Experience of managing multimillion dollar core transformation projects in emerging markets, specifically within the Middle East  ·       Technical knowledge: Microsoft Project, TEMENOS Implementation Methodology. Ability to assess implications of banking and technology trends.  ·       Others: Ideally prior experience in the position of a Project/Implementation Manager on client site and posses IT technical and general leadership qualities.  This job involves complex activities demanding considerable co-ordination to effectively achieve the job end results; therefore one needs the ability to influence others at all levels, internally and externally, and prioritize and assess issues in a timely and effective manner. Fully understand and be able to deploy the TEMENOS Implementation Methodology.     Other prerequisites: 
  ·       Management of off shore development teams  ·       Flexibility for extensive travel  ·       Excellent leadership and conflict management skills  ·       Global experience  ·       Ability to work under pressure and within tight deadlines  ·       Experience of P&L ownership

column7:
StudyCo is a professional student recruitment and training company providing consultation services to students regarding the selected destination to study abroad, the universities, programs, admissions, accommodations and student Visas.
 
POSITION PURPOSE
The Education Counsellor is responsible for providing information, advice, support and processing of applications for international students seeking placement in Australian education institutions. The Education Counsellor is also responsible for directly promoting StudyCo products and services to students. The counsellor will also provide support and referral for students with issues other than placement.
 
RESPONSIBILITIES 
 Provide information and advice to international students and their families regarding study opportunities in Australia and other study destinations, in English and other languages as applicable
 Effectively maintain and manage up-to-date leads (potential students) and applications pipelines to maximise conversion
 Assist in identification of opportunities and threat in the market
 Submit applications to institutions, obtain offers and facilitate enrolments
 Follow up leads and enquiries and maximise the number of applications submitted and finalised with StudyCo
 Support StudyCo network students with on-arrival issues and/or on-shore StudyCo services
 Maintain excellent knowledge of student visa conditions and client programs and processes
 Attend to student face-to-face, phone and email enquiries in a timely and professional manner
 Provide input on marketing activities to promote StudyCo brand and services and work with Marketing manager to coordinate the advertisements on community newspapers and websites.
  
Skills WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR
Knowledge of Australian education institutions and their international operations as well a other study destinations 
Demonstrated customer service orientation
Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively
Demonstrated ability to work in a team and Organisation skills
Understand needs and issues of on-shore international students
Fluent in English and a second language in Arabic
column12:
StudyCo is a professional student recruitment and training company providing students and parents with current information about studies offered globally. StudyCo Services offer information about the selected destination, the universities, programs, admissions, accommodations and student Visas. StudyCo was established in 1997 with a longstanding reputation as one of Australia's leading education agencies. StudyCo represents more than 500 universities globally as well as a number of leading English language centres, technical colleges and schools in Australia, New Zealand, the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Malaysia as well as Europe, Asia and South America.

StudyCo’s headquarters are based in Melbourne, Australia but their global reach allows them to provide onshore support to students wherever they are in the world. StudyCo has become a proven source of knowledge and insight into the world, providing high-level briefings to state and federal government bodies, foreign governments, education ministries and the executive level of Australian Universities. An award winning agency for its excellence in service, StudyCo is a trusted agency due to its expertise and support for students from diverse cultural backgrounds, providing a full-service experience developed over years of experience working on behalf of the highest-level clients.

column7:
Role Purpose 
  The Internal Audit Specialist is responsible for executing field work and identifying findings to the internal audit team. He/she provides support in order to identify company's risks and suggest recommendations to mitigate them and reduce company's losses. 
Responsibilities Compose comprehensive segments of audit programs and audit reports which are in line with audit principles and standards Implement audit program reviews and testing in line with audit principles and standards Collaborate with internal audit team members to ensure that proper audit fieldwork is conducted   Coordinate with relevant staff and departments to extract necessary data and information Prepare list of audit findings and recommendations prior to the issuance of draft audit reports Obtain understanding of business processes and document minutes of meetings Participate in the discussion of findings and results during meetings  
 Qualifications  Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field 2 to 4 years of experience in a related field; IT audit and retail experience are a plus Professional qualification is a plus (CIA, CPA, ACCA) Fluency in English Proficiency in MS Office
column12:
Azadea Group is a premier lifestyle retail company that owns and operates more than 50 leading international franchise concepts across the Middle East and Africa. 

Since its inception in 1978, the Group has grown a substantial chain of stores representing leading international brand names in fashion and accessories, food and beverage, home furnishings, sporting goods, multimedia and beauty & cosmetics. 

With over 12,000 employees, the company boasts a solid infrastructure overseeing more than 650 stores spread across 14 countries including Algeria, Bahrain, Cyprus, Egypt, Ghana, Iraq, Jordan, Kenya, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Lebanon, Oman, Qatar and United Arab Emirates.

column7:
Area: Bekaa area 
About the role The branch manager is the operational contact person for Jammal Trust Bank’s key branch business relationships. Especially responsible for generating sales, revenue and market share, as well as setting and implementing strategies to attain good KPI results. As team leader, you oversee all branch operations, monitor and guide team members through meaningful performance development to create a memorable experience for clients. 
Responsibilities Control and monitor all branch operations Develop new business relationships Develop and implement strategies to generate and maintain good KPI results Generate and maintain sales, revenue and market share Achieve set targets for deposits, sales and loans Manage the branch with an efficient cost perception Guide employees in their daily activities and pioneer retail excellence to deliver a memorable customer experience. Coach your team on problem resolution, client servicing, and preventions at first point of contact Take appropriate actions to bridge gaps identified through operations, credit, compliance reviews and reports. Ensure implementation and comply with all internal and external regulations and requirements Coordinate with the Head Office to ensure alignment of strategy.   Skills and qualifications Degree in Business/Finance or any other related field Should have minimum 8 years of experience in retail banking of which 5 years as a branch manager or assistant branch manager. High level of knowledge and expertise in local banking operations and regulations Ability to grow and adapt to a fast paced environment Strong organizational and communications skills Dedicated and enthusiastic team leader and team player who is able to take the initiative. Package Competitive package including incentives (when applicable) Work in a challenging, dynamic and progressive environment Strong brand that supports your goals and “speaks your language.”   About Jammal Trust Bank Jammal Trust Bank (JTB) is one of Lebanon’s Leading Commercial Banks in SMEs. JTB offers a wide range of financial services including Commercial, Corporate and Retail Banking, as well as Micro-finance and SME lending. For over 55 years, the Bank continues to invest first and foremost in its clients for them to develop their businesses and thrive.
column12:
For over 50 years, Jammal Trust Bank has been building a reputation and reinforcing its position as market leader in SMEs, which constitute the largest segment of the Lebanese economy and population.
Jammal Trust Bank continues to invest first and foremost in its clients, by tailoring products and offering financial services that fit their needs including Commercial, Corporate, Trade Finance and Retail Banking, as well as Micro-finance and SME lending.
The Bank operates in 25 branches spread all over the Lebanese territory and has three representative offices in Nigeria, the Ivory Coast and the United Kingdom.

Jammal Trust Bank (JTB) became one of the first Lebanese Banks to sign the Investors for Governance and Integrity Declaration, demonstrating the Bank’s commitment to best-in-class Governance and ethical standards. 

Jammal Trust Bank is always committed to “Speak Your Language” and meet your banking needs.

column7:
The medical consultant is a member of the medical team which develops and manages health and wellness programs for Cigna customers. Together with a team of nurses and physicians you will ensure attainment of quality, production, timeliness, cost containment goals, and excellent customer satisfaction for both internal and external customers. Ability to review, investigate, and respond to external and internal inquires/complaints. Provides guidance and acts as a mentor or coach for the nurses and other non-clinical staff.  You will work with a multicultural population and is constantly aware of the cultural differences among that population and the geographical regions.  
 Major responsibilities and desired results:  ·         Part of a clinical team that provides medical management services to customers worldwide but mainly in Middle East and North Africa Region.  ·         Give evidence-based advice on medical claims, taking into account internationally accepted protocols and local and/or regional customs and regulations.  ·         Support and monitor the case management, disease management and other clinical services and assure quality of performance against QA standards to promote optimal service delivery and ensure accurate statistical data and reports. Give advice on appropriate corrective action if necessary.  ·         Assist in fraud detection.  ·         Assist is the coordination of processes for improving quality of care and health outcomes for specifically delineated projects or populations. Excellent communication and facilitation skills are keys to success.  ·         Assist and support the team in cost containment, assist in projects and service delivery to meet goals.  ·         Work together with the team on quality improvement and clinical management projects within Clinical Operations  ·         Serves as a resource/educator regarding specific areas of expertise. Able to create and implement appropriate educational clinical programs content for internal and external audiences and link with Cigna University resources.  ·         Other duties as assigned  
 Requirements:  ·         Medical Doctor Degree with international healthcare experience specially in Middle East and North Africa  ·         3-5 years of clinical experience preferable in a payer setting on medical management  ·         Experience in utilization management, case management, and disease management programs and tools is an advantage  ·         Strong interpersonal and communication skills  ·         Demonstrates pro-active problem-solving and analytical skills.  ·         Knowledge of utilization/case management, cost containment services, managed care, insurance coverage, and financial management  ·         Ability to operate a personal computer, proficient with Microsoft office products, call center software, and a variety of software for medical management.  ·         Ability to build solid working relationships with staff, matrix partners, clients, customers and healthcare providers  ·         Stress resistant and efficient, finding a good balance between quality and quantity  ·         Ability to speak, write and read English, any other language a plus
column9: Financial Services, Hospital & Health Care, Insurance
column11: Customer Service, Health Care Provider, Consulting
column12: Cigna is a global health service and insurance company dedicated to helping people improve their health, well-being and sense of security. Cigna has almost 40,000 employees who service 85 million customer relationships throughout the world. In Europe, Middle-East and Africa, Cigna has multiple business units providing healthcare insurance services to local individuals, expatriates, corporates and International Organizations.

column7:
Senior Purchasing Manager 
Competitive Package: 
Salary Expectation:  3000 $  - 3500 $ 
 Procurement Manager Responsibilities 
 ·         Devising and using fruitful procurement and sourcing strategies  ·         Discovering profitable suppliers and initiate procurement partnerships  ·         Negotiating with external vendors to secure advantageous terms 
 Job brief 
 We are looking for an experienced Procurement Manager to manage the company’s supply of products and services. Procurement Manager responsibilities include strategizing to find cost-effective deals and suppliers. The Procurement Manager’s duty is to discover the best ways to cut procurement expenses, so that the company can invest in growth and people. 
 Responsibilities 
 ·         Devise and use fruitful sourcing strategies  ·         Discover profitable suppliers and initiate business and organization partnerships  ·         Negotiate with external vendors to secure advantageous terms  ·         Approve the ordering of necessary goods and services  ·         Finalize purchase details of orders and deliveries  ·         Examine and test existing contracts  ·         Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness  ·         Collaborate with key persons to ensure clarity of the specifications and expectations of the company  ·         Foresee alterations in the comparative negotiating ability of suppliers and clients  ·         Expect unfavorable events through analysis of data and prepare control strategies  ·         Perform risk management for supply contracts and agreements  ·         Control spend and build a culture of long-term saving on procurement costs  Requirements  ·         Proven working experience as a procurement manager, procurement officer or head of procurement  ·         Knowledge of sourcing and procurement techniques as well as a dexterity in “reading” the market  ·         Talent in negotiations and networking  ·         Good knowledge of supplier or third party management software  ·         Aptitude in decision-making and working with numbers  ·         Experience in collecting and analyzing data  ·         Strong leadership capabilities  ·         BSc degree in supply chain management, logistics or business administration
column12:
KBE is a leading manufacturer of a complete line of air movement products, dedicated to provide the best service for the HVAC market. Since it was founded in 1979, KBE has expanded its product line to include most air distribution products for use in residential, commercial, industrial, and institutional buildings.

KBE manufactures a wide range of grilles, registers, louvers, sound attenuators and dampers. Its products’ performance has been tested and certified at renowned laboratories and test facilities, as well as having been proven in a large number of installations and under all types of operating conditions. 

KBE controls the quality of each product at every stage of the manufacturing process. A qualified quality control staff is in charge of maintaining a level of quality that meets the highest standards. KBE manufactures safety products in accordance with the latest standards set by the Underwriters Laboratories (UL) - USA. These products include Fire, Smoke, Combination Fire-Smoke and Ceiling Radiation Dampers, all of which are tested at Underwriters Laboratories (UL). All the previously mentioned products are UL classified and carry the UL label. Please visit the UL web site at www.ul.com.

KBE also manufactures Air Outlet products that were tested by Intertek Testing Services (ETL-ITS) laboratories in NY – USA in accordance with the ASHRAE 70-1991 standards, which specifies methods for testing and rating the performance of air outlets and inlets. Please visit ETL-ITS website at www.intertek-etlsemko.com for further verification.

KBE is a member of Air Movement and Control Association International Inc. (AMCA). KBE manufactures louvers that were tested by AMCA Laboratories in Illinois - USA in accordance with AMCA Standard 500. Please visit the AMCA website at www.amca.com for further verification.

KBE is a member in NFPA and SMACNA USA.

column7:
Monty Mobile is recruiting for its Lebanon Office a Business Executive: Messaging.    
Main job responsibilities are:  
Monitoring any discrepancies in number of traffic (either gain or loss) for A2P and P2P
Monitoring the delivery percentages for A2P and P2P
Monitoring any leakages on A2P clients’ networks
Conducting business cases on how to increase P2P and A2P traffic from and for each client
Working on increasing our 2 way deals
Following up with the client on any pending request or issue (emails of phone calls)
Indicating any new features that needs to be added on live monitor or OTT tool in order to facilitate our work and consistently monitoring if these tools are working well (OTT tool, live monitor, external client portal, etc) Checking for tenders through the tender alerts received daily and MNO websites Administrating the tenders submitted 
 Requirements: 
  Education: BA in Business Administration
Years of experience: minimum 1 year of experience within the industry.
Excellent English
Proficient in Excel
Salary: 800$ to 1000$ Net
 
 Kindly Apply only if you fit the above needed qualifications.  Interested candidates kindly send your CV attached to: hr@montymobile.com
